useCase.name: Deployment of a New Dataset Type Version

mainSequence.step: Check for existing versions in Version Control
Retrieve current versions of dataset type from Dataset Management
List of current versions provided to Version Control
Confirm existing versions by Version Control
Create new version by Deployment Module
Register new dataset type version in Dataset Management
Version registered successfully in Version Control
New version created by Deployment Module
Include new dataset type in app artifact by Deployment Module
App artifact updated in App Artifact Repository
Deployment successful, confirmation sent to developer
